author: Don Beach (Ernest Raymond Beaumont-Gantt)
description: Lightly muddle mint in base of shaker (just to bruise). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain glass filled with crushed ice.
name: Mai Tai (Beaumont-Gantt's recipe)
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly muddle mint in base of shaker (just to bruise)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain glass filled with crushed ice
